title: Aviator Substrate Manifest
description: The canonical schema for validating Airport Sovereign Intent manifests and GitOps infrastructure declarations.

resource.description: Container for Aviator Substrate resource definitions.

aviator_airport.description: Conceptual parent container for plane definitions.

name.description: Human-readable name of the Airport. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

aviator_plane.description: Represents a unique sovereign trust domain within an Airport.

airport_id.description: The URN of the parent Airport (e.g., airport:atlanta).

type.description: The trust strata (e.g., CONTROL, DATA_PLANE). Unique per Airport. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

description.description: The semantic rationale for this plane's existence.

aviator_signal_surface.description: Defines a unique telemetry or event boundary on a Sovereign Plane.

name.description: Unique name of the signal surface on this specific plane. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

description.description: Mandatory description for this signal surface.

signals.description: List of signals for this surface. Must have at least one.

aviator_domain_authorization.description: Maps a Sovereign Plane to a Signal Surface via a mandatory Rationale.

plane_id.description: The URN of the Plane being authorized. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

signal_surface_id.description: The URN of the Signal Surface being granted access. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

rationale.description: The mandatory Rationale explaining why this trust boundary is being crossed.

aviator_capability_attestation.description: The physical evidence linking a Domain Authorization to a functional reality.

name.description: Unique name of the capability being attested. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

domain_authorization_id.description: The URN of the Domain Authorization this attestation satisfies. Note: Changing this requires resource replacement.

description.description: The mandatory Rationale for this specific attestation.

base_eval_uri.description: Base URI for evaluation. If set, the attestation will be evaluated by calling this URI.

status.description: Status of the attestation: CAPABLE, INCAPABLE, INDETERMINATE, or ERROR (Computed).
